protocol.text: GeneChip intensities were background-corrected, normalized and sumarized by RMA method, using the “Affy” package from Bioconductor. ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA signal
After growing for 20 days, plants were separated into two batches; one irrigated with water and the other with 200 mM Na2S for 10 additional days.
Arabidopsis thaliana (accession Col-0) and the des1-1 mutant (SALK_103855 ) were grown in soil under a photoperiod of 16 h of white light (120 μE m-2 s-1) at 20°C and 8 h dark at 18°C.
RNA was prepared using TRIzol (Invitrogen) and the RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen). RNA was quantified and the RNA quality was assessed with a 2100 Bioanalyzer from Agilent Technologies
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 500 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit).

Following fragmentation, 10 ug of biotinylated cRNA were hybridized to Affymetrix chips (ATH1). Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM 2-(N-morpholino)ethanesulfonic acid, 1 M Na+, and 20mM of EDTA in the presence of 0.01% of Tween-20 to a final cRNA concentration of 0.05 ug/ml. Hybridization was performed for 16 h at 45°C . Each microarray was washed and stained with streptavidin-phycoerythrin in a Fluidics station 450 (Affymetrix).
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
